lines.text: You don't look well. Have you been sleeping properly?

[who wasn't gotten actual sleep in days]
Like a top.
I think "I Love Lucy"'s overrated, myself.
[Miles shows up, with flowers etc., at Melissa's place, after the night he nearly raped her]
I didn't know there was a Hallmark card for this kind of thing...
I think I'm missing the relationship chromosome.
I mean, Michael's cute and all, but how much fun can it be sitting at home watching him sulk night after night?
"Aesthete sought. Prefer overeducated dilettante. Experience frowned upon."
Even Hemingway wasn't good at being Hemingway.
